sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with gu du 蠱毒② , gu poison . Pu ji fang 普濟方 174: 治誤食頭髮如蠱疾 者，右用雄黃研細，水飛過，酒調服，吐出惡物乃愈 , “To cure something resembling gu -ailment following mistaken consumption of human hair. [For these indications listed] above, one uses finely ground xiong huang , refined with water, and ingests it mixed with wine. [Patients] will vomit the malign items and this is the cure”.
